name: SODIC MIRROR™ — Redemption Tarot-Sod App v1.0
description: A multi-page, sacred web application for Kabbalistic soul alignment using the Redemption Tarot-Sod Deck. Features include intention setting, card drawing, and AI-powered (Gemini API) five-module interpretations via HaMefaresh HaPenimi v6.1, alongside Tree of Life resonance mapping. This is a spiritual diagnostic tool for Tikun and conscious return.
